review_text: Prison Architect chills me to the bone. If played haphazardly it can be a wonderful farce rich with hilarious anecdotes, but played patiently and carefully it’s a horror game, a top-down voyage into the heart of darkness, an eternal raging fire I forever try but can only fail to douse.

review_text: I've been thinking about this game a lot for the past 36 hours. It demanded I think about it, at first only superficially, but later more substantively. I mulled over a lot of questions when I should have been sleeping. I continued thinking right when I woke up. I think I dreamed about it in between.

review_text: Brisbane-based Earthwork Games has brought out a fort building - and fort destroying - simulator that combines strategy, engineering, aiming, and micromanagement. review_text: 不羁于武侠游戏的条条框框，用它丰富的内容、精致的细节，与独特的探案主题，打造出了一种返璞归真的体验。

name: Fate Seeker II
categories: ['Single-player', 'Steam Achievements', 'Full controller support', 'Steam Cloud', 'Family Sharing']
tags: {'RPG': 103, 'Martial Arts': 68, 'Action RPG': 65, 'Puzzle': 54, 'Exploration': 52, 'Open World': 46, 'Hack and Slash': 45, 'Singleplayer': 38, '3D': 37, 'Third Person': 37, 'Drama': 35, 'Lore-Rich': 34, 'Investigation': 33, 'Story Rich': 29, 'Historical': 28, 'Sexual Content': 13, 'Dating Sim': 11, 'Nudity': 5}

review_text: Number 1 game of the year ... Eco is a revelation ... It made me realize that games are actually crucial for understanding our relationship to all kinds of natural and man-made systems. The thing that gives me chills is that I think it is only in games that we can play with economic systems. And I walked away from my experience in Eco feeling like I learned so much even though we had no instructor. No one was connecting the dots for us. We simply learned through play.

review_text: Apparently somewhere between the genuine bona fide electrified six-car monorail, the prostitutes and the land mines, I lost the support of the electorate.

name: Democracy 3
categories: ['Single-player', 'Steam Achievements', 'Steam Trading Cards', 'Steam Workshop', 'Steam Leaderboards', 'Family Sharing']
tags: {'Political Sim': 520, 'Simulation': 369, 'Politics': 321, 'Strategy': 284, 'Indie': 166, 'Turn-Based': 158, 'Singleplayer': 126, 'Political': 126, 'Economy': 119, 'Management': 106, 'Sandbox': 89, 'Moddable': 60, 'Difficult': 47, '2D': 34, 'Turn-Based Strategy': 26, 'Education': 23, 'Casual': 23, 'Capitalism': 19, 'Sequel': 17, 'Funny': 13}
review_text: I returned to Democracy 3 in an attempt to put right the wrongs of my previous administration. On my first visit, I broke Britain, crushing its culture and creating a country reminiscent of Clockwork Orange, filled with gangs and ultraviolence.

categories: ['Single-player', 'Steam Achievements', 'Steam Trading Cards', 'Steam Workshop', 'Steam Leaderboards', 'Family Sharing']

review_text: Positech has made, I believe, one of the fullest real-world governance simulation games ever conceived. It’s engaging, it’s self-aware, and, at times, it’s funnier than anyone might have expected
